[World-Wise Vigilance](/Feats.aspx?ID=4119) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #189: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires](/Sources.aspx?ID=195) pg. 79</row>

**Archetype** [Twilight Speaker](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=203)

**Prerequisites**
[Twilight Speaker Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=4114)

</column>

---

Your keen study of other cultures gives you insights into the ways those cultures fight. When you use Perception to roll initiative and none of your enemies have the [elf](/Traits.aspx?ID=58) trait, you can choose to roll [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) instead.
name: World-Wise Vigilance
